fullplot: A poignant comedy about a mute who befriends Nicole, the little daughter of a prostitute. Gleason shows his considerable talents as an actor without uttering a sound as he plays the bumbling, kind-hearted janitor, Gigot. Gleason wrote the original story and music for this film.
plot: Jackie Gleason plays a mute janitor who befriends Nicole, the little daughter of a prostitute.
title: Gigot
